297a6('dul ba): dra sa kyi ste/ de ge 'dun mi mthun par mi 'byor bar mdzad na// tsheng ldan pa gang dag phreng bya dus sa gu / /
297b1('dul ba): mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la smos pa'i gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de ni smyos
297b2('dul ba): pa'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i tshi ga dang laso// gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pA 'ga' zhig rgyal po la sogs pas bzung ste mtshams kyi nang na 'dug na pho nya btang ba la sogs pas de dang
297b3('dul ba): mthun pa bsgrub pa'i phyir 'bad par bya ba dang / dge slong blo bur du 'ongs pa 'ga' zhig mtshams kyi nang na 'dug par 'phrigs na btsal ba tsa dang / bod pa dang / mthon par 'dug ste phyogasasu lta ba dag gis de dang
297b4('dul ba): mthun par sgrub pa'i phyir 'bad par bya ba dang / mtshams gcig gi nang du tshegs tha dad pas las tha dad pa mang po so so na byed na 'dun pa dang yong su dag pa phan tshun dbul ba dag gis de dang mthun bsgrub
297b5('dul ba): pa'i phyir 'bod par bya'o// de ni mthun pa'i gso sbyong la tshogs phyur bya ba'i cho ga'o// gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi chu ga'i skabs nas/ gso sbyong gi gnas 'du ba'i mdun rol kho nur gaus
297b6('dul ba): sbyor snga ma 'das pa'i mtha' tshun tshod kyi zla ba phyed kyi ltung ba la so sor brtag cing ltung ba shes pa bshags pa 'am/ bsdam po 'am/ byin gyis brlab pas phyir bcos te las kyi gan su 'dug par bya'o zhes gsungs
298a1('dul ba): pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gso sbyong zhes bya ba ni bslab pa gsum po dag gso zhing sbyong bar byed pa ste/ de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ mthun pa'i gso sbyong dang / zhi gnas kyi gso sbyo // de la mthun pa'i gso sbyong ni ldang /
298a2('dul ba): pa'i tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas te gnas dang tshogs pa dang cho ga mthun par bya ba'o// zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong ni lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab kyi dbang du byas te spong ba'i yan lag bsgom pa'o// de yang lnga
298a3('dul ba): phyi ma rnams ni mi bya ba'i chu lon gyis bsdam pa yin pas de ni mthun pa'i gso sbyong gis sdom par bye // las snga ma rnams ni bsgom pa'i rnam pas sbyang ba yin pas de ni zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong gis sbyong bar byed de
298a4('dul ba): des ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims la brten ti lhag pa'i sems skye la/ lhag pa'i sems la brten te lhag pa'i shes rab skye bas bslab pa gsum po dag gso zhing sbyong ba ni mthun pa'i gso sbyong dang zhi gnos kyi gso sbyong
298a5('dul ba): yin par shes par bya'o// skabs 'dir ni mthun pa'i gso sbyong gzung bar bya ste/ mthun pa'i gso sbyong ni rnam pa lnga ste/ bcu ban pa dang / bco lnga pA dang / bkra shis kyi gso sbyong dang / gnod pa byung ba'i gso sbyong dang /
298a6('dul ba): bsdum pa'i gso sbyong ngo // de la gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa dang / bco lnga pa ni dus tshogs drug po dag gis zla ba bcu gnyis la gso sbyong nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa las drug ni gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa yin la/ bco brgyad ni
298b1('dul ba): gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin te/ dbyar zla gsum dang / dgun zla gsum gyi ni ra pa dang / tha chung mar gyi ngo bco lnga mi thub pas ra pA dang tha chung gi gnam stong bzhi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa yin la/ ston zla gsum dang dpyid zla
298b2('dul ba): gsum gyi ni 'bring por mur gyi ngo bco lnga mi thub pas 'bring po'i gnam stong gnyis gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa yino// lhag ma bco nga ni gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin no// de dag brtsi bA ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba de raM
298b3('dul ba): zhing sgyug ma'i thur ma bco lnga skud pa la brgyus pa nyi ma re re bgrang zhing dge skos kyi gnas bornyan la brtags te dge 'dun la nyi ma re zhing brjod par bya'o// zla ba shel dor ba ni rgyal po'i rjesu 'brang bas dor ro// rgyu skar ni
298b4('dul ba): skar mkhan gyi rjesu 'brang bas shes par bya'o// bkra shis kyi gso sbyong dang / gnod pa byung ba'i gso sbyong dang / bsdum pa'i gso sbyong dag ni/ gang gi tshe de dag bya dgos pa de'i che bya bar zad kyi dus nges pa ni med do// 'di
298b5('dul ba): la ni dge slong thams cad kyis gso sbyong gi gan su 'du ba'i mdun rol kho nar gso sbyong snga ma 'das pa'i mtha' tshun chad kyi zla ba phyed kyi ltung ba la so sor brtag par bya ste/ ltung ba shes pa bshags pa'am/ bsdams pa
298b6('dul ba): 'am/ byin gyis brlab pas phyir bcos te las kyi gan su 'du bar bya'o// de'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste/ ltung byed 'ba' zhig gam/ so sor bshags par bya ba 'am/ bshags par bya ba'i nyes byas las gang yang
299a1('dul ba): rung ba zhig shes na/ des mchil lham gnyis phud nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te dge slong ltung ba mi mthun pa gcig gi mdun du rgan pa la phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar ba
299a2('dul ba): btung nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ltung ba de dag pa'i mtha' tshun chad nas
299a3('dul ba): bzung ste tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mo thol lo// 'chag so// mi 'chab bo// mthel zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi ma mthol ma bshags na ni mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsu
299a4('dul ba): du bzlas/ len pas ltung ba mthong ngam zhes brjod par bya'o// 'chags pas mthong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// len+ya pas phyin chad sdom mam zhes brjod par bya'o// 'chags pas sdom mo zhes brjod par bya'o// de
299a5('dul ba): bzhin du lan gnyis len gsum du bzlas/ len paso thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// tshigs pos lag so zhes blo rjed par bya'o// de'i tshe dge slong ltung ba la dogs pa dang / yid gnyis za bar gyur na dge
299a6('dul ba): slong des yang sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa dag la dros te ltung ba la dogs pa dang yid gnyis pas lo nas dge slong gi mdun du ches bzhin du phyir bya'o// bsdam par bya ba'i nyes byas
299b1('dul ba): gang yang rung zhig shes na rang gi sems kyis bsdam par bya'o// dge 'dun lhag ma dang nyes pa sbom po dang spang ba'i ltung byed kyi ltung ba gang rung zhig shes na byin gyis brlab par bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste/ des snga ma bzhin du mchi
299b2('dul ba): lham gnyis phung nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ dge slong ltung ba mi mthun pa gcig gi mdun du rgan pa la phyagro 'tshal nas tsog tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar ba btung nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// tshe dang
299b3('dul ba): ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba le ltung ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas der ltung ba de tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bgyi'o//
299b4('dul ba): seng nang par ltung ba de cho sna bzhin du slar bgyi'o// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ da ni gso sbyong gnasu 'du ba'i mdun rel tu ltung ba shes pa dang / yid gnyis za ba dang / bshags pa dang /
299b5('dul ba): bsdams pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga dang bsngags so// mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi cho ga'i skabs nas/ gsol bru byAs twe so sor thar po'i mdo gdon pas gso sbyong za bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya
299b6('dul ba): ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi las yino// des mi nus pa nyid yin na gnyis pa'i las yono// des kyang mi nus pa nyid yin no/ gsum po'i las yin no// des kyang mi nus pa nyid
300a1('dul ba): yin na thams cad kyis rus kyi sku gdon par bya'o// res 'bab pa'i tshe des 'don mI nuswA na gzhan la bcol bar bya'o// des ma btub na dge 'dun gyis de la bcol bar bya'o// 'don pa de dag gis tshig phyed
300a2('dul ba): kyang ma 'khrul par legs par thon po de nyid yin na gdon gyi gzhan du na mi chag so// 'dren pa'i tshe rdugs na lhag ma gzhan gyis gdon par bya'o// dum bu 'dzin pa nyid yin na ji snyed kyis gzhung srongs pa de nyid kyis
300a3('dul ba): phag tu phyed du bcad de gdon par bya'o// 'don par byed pas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i gsol pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ mdo 'don pa seng gau'i khri la 'dug nas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa dang / dus dang por bya
300a4('dul ba): ba dag dza~M patwen nas/ de'i 'og tu gsol ba 'ba'o zhig gis lus bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste/ steng ga'i khri la 'dug bzhin du 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsun du gsol/ dang dge
300a5('dul ba): 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa 'am/ bco lnga ba ste/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus li byeb cing bzed na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / deng doge 'dun gyi gso sbyong mdzad de so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa
300a6('dul ba): gdon to// 'di ni gsel ba'o// de ltar gsol ba byas nas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa rnam pa lnga po gleng gzhi gdon pa dang pham par ma gyur pa gdon pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa dang / ma nges pa gdon pa
300b1('dul ba): dang / ril gyis gden pa dag gdon par bya'o// de la gleng gzhi gdon pa ni rdzogs pa kho nar mi gdon du myi rung ngo // gleng gzhi bton nas lhag ma rnams ni thos pa bsgrags pas sgrub tu rung ngo // de yang gleng gzhi bton
300b2('dul ba): sa pham par 'gyur ba gdon pa brtsams na pham par 'gyur pa'i sde chen rdzogs par gdon dgros so// pham par 'gyur ba bton nas dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa brtsams na dge 'dun lhag ma'i sde tshan yang rdzogs
300b3('dul ba): pa gdon dgos so// dge 'dun lhag ma bton nas ma nges pa gdon pa brtsams na ma nges pa'i sde chen yang rdzogs par gdon dgos te/ pham par 'gyur pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ma nges pa yan chad kyi
300b4('dul ba): sde tshanA ni gdon par mgo brtsams na gang brtsams pa'i sde tshan de nyid rdzogs par byA dgo so// sbyang ba'i ltung byed man chad kyi sde tshan ni gdon par mgo brtsams na lhag ma so sor thar pa'i gzhung thams cad rdzog
300b5('dul ba): par gdon dgos te/ ril gyis gdon pa zhes bya ba yang de yin no// mgo brtsams pa'i sde tshan de nyid rdzogs par bya dgos pa de dge ma rdzogs na mi 'chag so// 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dron lam du 'gro la
300b6('dul ba): 'dron pa don mthun pa dag sdong du mi btub na 'gro bzhin du gdon par bya ste/ 'di ni les 'dug pa nyid kyis bya'o// zhes gsungs pa'i dmigs kyis bsal ba yin no// sgra mi 'dod na mdor bsrungs te gdon to// de
301a1('dul ba): tsam+ba yang mi 'dod na byin gyis brlab par bya'o// chos ma yin pas 'don pas 'don na mi 'chags te/ gdon par bya ba dang / de'i tshad dang / dus dang / gdon par byed pa rnams de kho na bzhin nye
301a2('dul ba): bar ma bzung ba ni 'dir chos ma yin po'o// gdon par bya ba de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni so ser thar pa'i mdo las gzhan pa phrin tshegs la sogs pa gdon pa'o// de'i tshad de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung pa ni
301a3('dul ba): gleng gzhi mi 'don zhing lhag ma rnams kyang thos pa bsgrags pas sgrub par mi byed pa'o// de'i dus de kho na bzhin nye bar bzung ba ni gso sbyong gi dus las gzhan pa'i dusu 'dron pa'o// 'don par byed pa de kho na bzhin nye bar
301a4('dul ba): me bzung ba ni gang zug bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang mtshan dang lta ba dang tshul khrims mthun pa dag las gzhan pas gdon pa'o// don so sor thar pa'i mdo ga don pa'i cho ga dang laso// mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi cho
301a5('dul ba): ga'i skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge sbyong gi dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba d+ha na na des ltung ba de dge slong dru na me la byin gyis brlab par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ des dge slong drung na
301a6('dul ba): 'dug pa'i mdun du tsog tsog pur 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhe
301b1('dul ba): 'i glus sbyong yang bcoM m+b+ha pA lcag tA/ da/ dag srung mang 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba 'di dang 'di lta gu T+wA~Mg d+hun te/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang ltung ba 'di tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du/
301b2('dul ba): byin gyis brlabs te/ gso sbyong bgyi'o// seng na du pur ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar brgya'o zhes lhan cig brjod par bya'o// de ni dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung bAr d+han po byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga pa'i
301b3('dul ba): sngag so// de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pA de nyid la dge slong dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba la yid gnyis deng bcas par gyur na ngos ltung ba de dge slong drung nI mi la byin+da gyis brlad par bya'o zhes gsungs bya ni
301b4('dul ba): 'di ltar bya ste/ des dge slong drung nA 'dug pa'i mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga
301b5('dul ba): pA lags la/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes dbyi bu'i gso sbyong yang bcwo lnga pa legs te/ bdag dge slong ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi nung du ltung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig la yid gnyisu gyur ni bdag
301b6('dul ba): gis deng ltung ba de tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bgyi'o// sang nang par dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te dogs pa dang yid gany+tsa
302a1('dul ba): bsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi'o// zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o// de ni dge slong dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang sngagaso// de nyid
302a2('dul ba): kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong las byed pa dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba dran na ltung ba de rang gis sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ des 'dug bzhin du sems
302a3('dul ba): kyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin la/ bdag dge slong las byed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin te/ bdag dge slong las byed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba
302a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig dran te/ bdag dge slong las byed pas ming 'di zhes bya bas deng ltung ba de rung gi sems kyis byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bya'o// song nud par ltung bya do chos
302a5('dul ba): bzhin du phyir bya'o zhes lan gcig brjod par bya'o// de ni las byed pas dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba dran pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang sngags// de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong btso lnga pa de nyid lha dge slong las
302a6('dul ba): byed pas dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba la yang gnyis dang bcas par gyur na des ltung ba de rang gi sems kyis byin gyis brlabs par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ des 'dug bzhin sems kyis 'di skad
302b1('dul ba): brlab pa'i cho ga dang sngag so// de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bcwo lnga pa de nyid la dge slong las byed pas dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na des ltung ba de rang gi sems kyis byin gyis brlabs par
302b2('dul ba): bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ des 'dug bzhon sems kyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dring dge 'dun gyi glo so sbyong bco lnga pa yin la/ bdag dge slong las byed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gso sbyong yang bco
302b3('dul ba): lnga pa yin te/ bdag dge slong los byed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig la yid gnyi su gyur na bdag dge sbyong las byed pa ming 'di zhes bya bas deng ltung ba de rang gos sems
302b4('dul ba): kyis byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bya'o// sang nang par dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / mA mo 'dzin pa rnams la dri ste dogs tu dang yid gnyis bsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin phyir bya'o//
302b5('dul ba): zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o// de ni las byed pa dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga dang spagaso// de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyo nga bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun
302b6('dul ba): thams cad 'dug cing mthun pa dang bcas par gyur na/ dge slong de rnams kyis gang gi mdun du de rnams ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir bya ba'i dge slong 'ga' zhig gnas gzhan du song la dge slong gi mdun du ltung
303a1('dul ba): ba de chos bzhin du phyir byed pa de lta bu spro bar bya'o// gal te 'grub na de lta na legs ci ste mi 'grub na dge slong de rnams kyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi lus kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs
303a2('dul ba): pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gal te gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun thams cad kyi ltung ba mthun pa dang bcas pa rang shes par gyur na dge slong gcig mtshams gzhan gyi dge slong gi drung du btang ste/ des der ltung pa dran par phyir
303a3('dul ba): bcos te phyir 'ongs nas de'i mdun du thams cad kyis ltung ba shes pa phyir bcos te gso sbyong bya'o// gal te cho ga de mu grub na dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyi byin gyis brlab par bya'o// 'di ltar
303a4('dul ba): bya ste/ 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dring dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba dang bcas pa gyu so/ gang gi mdun
303a5('dul ba): du bdag cag ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi ba bdag cag las dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la/ dge slong gi mdun du ltung ba de tshes bzhin du slar bgyid par spro ba su yang mi mchis nu/ gal te dge 'dun
303a6('dul ba): gyi dus la babo cing bzed na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba de byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong mdzad la/ slad kyis dge slong gis mdun du ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar
303b1('dul ba): mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// de ni gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun thams cad kyis ltung ba mthun pa shes pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang laso// de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba
303b2('dul ba): la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na dge slong de rnams kyis glang gi mdun du de rnams ltung bya de chos bzhin du phyir bya ba'i dge slong 'ga' zhig gnas gzhan du song la/ dge slong mdo sde dang / 'dul pa dang / ma mi 'dzin
303b3('dul ba): pa rnams la dris te ltung ba la yid gnyis bsal nas chos bzhin du phyir byed pa de lta bu spro bar bya'o// gal te 'grub na de lta na legs/ ci ste mi 'grub na dge slong de rnams kyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las kyis
303b4('dul ba): byin gyis brlab par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gal te gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na dge slong cig mtshams gzhan gyi dge slong mdo
303b5('dul ba): sde dang 'dul ba dang mo mo 'dzin pa rnams kyi drung du bta ste/ des der ltung ba la dogs pa dang yid gnyis bsal te phyir 'ongs nas de'i mdun du thams cad kyis ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur
303b6('dul ba): be bsil tog so sbyong bya'o// gal te chog ngo mo grib ni dge slong gicig sogs gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las kyis byon gyis brlab par bya'o// 'di ltar la bya ste/ 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//
304a1('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong bco lnga pa lpags la/ bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba la dogs pa dang yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na/ gang gi
304a2('dul ba): mdun du bdag cag ltung ba de tshes bzhin du slar bgyi ba bdag cag las dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la/ dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris twa dogs pa dang /
304a3('dul ba): yid gnyis gsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyid par spro ba su yang ma mchis na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba de
304a4('dul ba): byin gyis brlabs te graste sbyong mdzad la/ slad kyis dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin bla rnams la dris te dogs pa dang yid gnyis bas la la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do//
304a5('dul ba): 'di ni gsol ba'o// de ni gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang las so// de nyid kyi skabs na sa graso sbyong bcwo lnga po de nyid la
304a6('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar
304b1('dul ba): gnas pa gcig pu ma gtogs pa dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na dge slong de/ dge slong gtam 'dres pa dang / phebs par smra ba dang / smos 'drin dang / 'grogs pa shes gang yin pa de'i drung du
304b2('dul ba): song ste/ ci nas kyang dge slong gzhan dag kyang ltung ba 'tshogs par 'gyur ba de ltar gleng ba dang dran par bya'o// gal te 'grub na de lta na legs/ ci ste mi 'grub cing dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par
304b3('dul ba): gyur na/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste/ 'dug la 'di skad tse sa brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ deng dge
304b4('dul ba): 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba'i slong du rtsod par gyu na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus lnga bab cang bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
304b5('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dong ltung ba'i slad du rtsod pa de byin gyis brlab sa te gso sbyong mi dzad la/ slad kyis dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te rtsod pa zhi bar bgyis
304b6('dul ba): le/ ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do// 'odadi ni gsol ba'o// de ni gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang sngag so// de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa
305a1('dul ba): de nyid la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba la nges pa nyid ma yin par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyi byin gyis brlangs te gso sbyong bya'o// zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gso sbyong bco
305a2('dul ba): lnga pa de nyid lnga dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa gcig pu ma gtogs pa dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na dge slong de/ dge slong gtam 'dres pa dang / phems par smra ba dang / smos 'drin dang /
305a3('dul ba): 'grogs bshes gang yin pa de'i drung du spong ste/ ci nas kyang dge slong gzhan dag kyang ltung ba 'chags par 'gyur pa de ltar gleng ba dang dran par bya'o// gal te 'grub na de lta na legs ci ste mi 'grub cing dge
305a4('dul ba): 'dun thams cad ltung ba la nges pa nyid ma yin par gyur na dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyi byin gyis brlab par bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste/ 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun
305a5('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi gloso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag cag dge 'dun thams cod ni ltung ba nges pa nyid ma lags par gyur na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la byeb cing bzod na dge
305a6('dul ba): 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dong ltung ba nges pa nyid ma lags pa de byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong mdzad la/ slad kyis dge slong ma mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin
305b1('dul ba): bya rnams la dris te nges pa nyid ma lags bu bsngal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// de ni gso sbyong gri dus su dge 'dun ltung ba la nges pa nyid ma yin par gyur pa byin gyis brlab pa'i
305b2('dul ba): cho ge dang sngagaso// mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi tshe ga'i skabs de nyid nas gnas gang na dge slong bzhi pas nyung ba gso sbyong bco lnga po de nyid la ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ des gtsug lag
305b3('dul ba): khang chag chag gdab par bya/ phyag dar bya/ ba lang gi lci ba srer pas byug par bya/ seng ge'i khri bsham par bya/ stan bsham par bya/ mar me gzugs par bya/ chos mnyan pa sbyin par bya'o// de'i 'og tu phyogs
305b4('dul ba): che sna mthon par 'dug ste phyogs bzhi re bolta bar bya'o// der dge slong yongasu dag po lta ba mthun pa la la dag 'ong ni 'di skad ces kye tshe dang ldan pa drag myur ba myur bar shog cig/ deng doge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga
305b5('dul ba): pa yi no zhes brjod par bya zhing / de drag dang lhan cig 'dug ste gso sbyong bya'o// glal te 'grub na de lta na legs/ tsi ste mi 'grub na dge slong dese byin gyisau brlab par bya'o// 'di ltar byA ste/ des rang gi stan+da lo 'dug ste/
305b6('dul ba): 'di ltar sems bskyed por bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya'o// deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin la/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin te/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
306a1('dul ba): byA bru bar chad kyi chos rnams yongasu dag go zhes kyang bdag sgra/ bdag yongasasu dag par lha rnams kyis gzung du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya bas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i
306a2('dul ba): phyir deng gso sbyong gyi byin gyis brlab bo// gang gi tshe dge 'dun tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong rgya cher nyam su myong bar bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon par bya'o// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan
306a3('dul ba): gsum du bzlaso/ gang na dge slong gnyis 'khod pa der ni rim pa de bzhin du bya zhing dus kyi bar du bsdad de/ ma grub no mdun du cog pur 'dug ste gcig/ la gcig 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// btsun pa 'am tshe dang
306a4('dul ba): ldan pa dgengasu gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bar chad kyi chos rnam
306a5('dul ba): yings dag go zhes bdag mchi/ bdag yongasu dag par btsun pa 'am tshe dang ldan pas bzung du gsol/ byadag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du deng
306a6('dul ba): gso sbyong byin gyis brlab bo// gang gi tshe dge 'dun tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong rgya cher nyam su myong bar bgyi zhing / so sor ther po'i mdo 'don pa gdon par bya'o// de bzhin du lani gnyis
306b1('dul ba): lan gsum du bzlas/ gang na dge slong gsum 'khod pa der ni rim pa de bzhin bya zhing dus kyi bar du bsdud de/ ma grub na rgan rims bzhin gral du 'khod de rim gyis byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags snga ma nyid brjod par
306b2('dul ba): bya'o// gang na dge slong bzhi 'khod pa der ni de rnams kyis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing der nad pa'i yongasu dag pa ni blang bar mi bya'o// gang du dge slong lnga 'am lhog pa 'khod pa der ni de rnams kyis gsol pa
306b3('dul ba): byas te/ gso sbyong bya zhing dwer nI nad pA'i yongasu dag pa yang blang por bya'o// gso sbyong gi gzhi'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs so// // dbyar dang de dang nye ba'i gzhi dgag dbye'i gzhi'i
306b4('dul ba): sdom la/ gnos mal dang ni tshul shing dang // snga ma phyi ma zhag bdun dang // bzhi btso dgag dbye gsol po dang // bdag dang glo bar bya ba'o// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas malnga stobs par sgro 'am
306b5('dul ba): spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnamasnga gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs la spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
306b6('dul ba): mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas mal stobs par bskos te/ dge slong gnas mal stobs pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobaso// 'di ni gsol
307a1('dul ba): ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas
307a2('dul ba): mal stobs par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas mal stobs par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis
307a3('dul ba): bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas mal stobs par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ deng dge
307a4('dul ba): 'dun gyi dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis deng tshul shing bzhes te sdang nang
307a5('dul ba): paR+Sha gnas par khas blango // 'di ni gsol ba'o// dbyar phyi ma la ni dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla tha chung tshes bco lnga lpags na zhes sngags kyi bye brag tu bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes
307a6('dul ba): bgyi ba nang mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir 'di lta ste/ gnas ral pa dang / 'dru mos pa bcas pa'i slad du sbyin bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang // zhal ta pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang / spyod yul gyi grong
307b1('dul ba): che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang / bro g.yog che ge mo zhes bgyi bas dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum gnas par khwas rlung ngo // bdag dbyar 'di nas mchis shing bdag gi dbyar 'di gyi gnas ni 'di lag so// dbyar phyi ma la ni dbyar phyi ma zla ba gsu
307b2('dul ba): glaganas bAr khas blang ngo zhes sngags kyis bye brag tu bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nong mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir dbyar zla ba gsum gnas pa khas blangs po lus bdag
307b3('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ bgyi ba zhig gi sgyid du dgung bdun mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchi bar byin gyis brlab bo// bdag dbyar 'di na mchis shing bdag gi dbyar gyi gnasabyar kI bzhi'o//
307b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa khyod zhag bzhi bcu byin gyis brlabs te dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ baming 'dri zhes bgyi ba na
307b5('dul ba): mtshams drang poHswA bany+tsi gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum gnas par khas blangs te/ bdag dbyer 'di na mchis shing bdag gi dbyar gyi gnas ni 'di lags ge sbyong ming 'di zhes bgyi
307b6('dul ba): bzhag bzhi bcu byin gyis brlabs te// dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams kyi slad ril du mchi ba dang / de tshun chad kyis slar mchi bar sgron thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun sa kyis thugs brtse ba'i
308a1('dul ba): slad du bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang bla stsal du gsol/ lan+da gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba 'di nang mtshams
308a2('dul ba): drang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum du gnas par khas blangs te/ 'di dbyer 'don mchis shing 'di'i dbyar gyi gnas 'di lags pa las dge slong mong 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi de la mtshams
308a3('dul ba): kyi slad rol du mchi ba dang de tshun chud kyis slar mchi bar dge 'dun las zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di dbyar
308a4('dul ba): 'di na mchis shing 'di'i dbyer gyi gnas 'di lags pa las dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi ba dang ngang tshun chad slar mchi bar dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dge 'dun gyis zhag bo zhi
308a5('dul ba): bcu'i gnang ba stsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di nang mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum gnas par
308a6('dul ba): khas blangs te/ 'di dbyar 'di na mchis shing 'di'i dbyar gyi gnas 'di lags pa las/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi ba dang dang tshun chad kyi slar mchi
308b1('dul ba): ba dge 'dun la zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang pa gsol te/ de'i slad du 'di dbyar 'dri na mchis shing 'di'i dbyar gyi gnas 'di lags pa las/ dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi ba dang / de tshun chad kyis
308b2('dul ba): slar mchi bar dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dge 'dun gyis zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang ba gsol na/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang ba stsal par/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dgra bzod pa de dag ni
308b3('dul ba): cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs dra shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang ba spyi la lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi
308b4('dul ba): gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin du 'a to// dbyar dang nye bo'i gzhi'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro chubs che ba ming 'di
308b5('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i dgag dbye yang bcwo lnga pa lags te/ bdag dge slong blo 'tshal ba sdug bsngal bya bre tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas
308b6('dul ba): pa'i dge 'dun la dgog dbye bgyid do// dgag dbye yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// lan gsum du bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags lo/ gnas ga
309a1('dul ba): ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/ gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong blo 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs
309a2('dul ba): che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dpya bgyid do// dgag dpya yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// lan
309a3('dul ba): gsum bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lbo pa lags la/ gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro che bas che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi pa'i
309a4('dul ba): dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/ gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong blo 'tshal ba sdug bsngal be bro tshangs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar
309a5('dul ba): gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi la dgag dbye bgyid do// dgag dbye yang brjod do// brjod par yang rig par bgyid// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag dge slong bro
309a6('dul ba): 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs tsho ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/ bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba mi 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa
309b1('dul ba): la 'dun pa 'bu'o// 'dun pa yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// lan gsum bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ ded dag 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/ gnas ga gra mo zhig na/ dge slong bro
309b2('dul ba): 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'do zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa legs te/ gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal pa bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dge 'dun
309b3('dul ba): chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bu'o// 'dun pa yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ deb dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye
309b4('dul ba): bco lnga pa lags la/ gnas ga gi mi zhig ni dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal pa bro tshabs che ba ming+ga 'di zhes 'gyi ba'i dgrag dbye yang btse lnga pa lags te/ gnas ga ge mo zhig nA dge slong bro 'tshal ba
309b5('dul ba): sdug bsngal pa blo tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bu'o// 'dun pa yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ deng dge
309b6('dul ba): 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/ bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro
310a1('dul ba): tsha bas che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bu'o// bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyidabyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyi do//
310a2('dul ba): 'dun pa dang dgag dbye bgyid do// 'dun pa dang dgag dbye yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// lan gsum du bzlas/ me dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ ded dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa logs la/
310a3('dul ba): gnas ga ge mo zhig ni dge slong bro 'chal ba sdug bsngal po bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/ gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bri 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba
310a4('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyu pa de dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bu'o// bdag mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye ba gyid do// 'dun pa dang dag
310a5('dul ba): dbye yang bgyid do// lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongasu gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/ gnas gau ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba ldog bsngal ba bro che bas che ba
310a6('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/ gnas ga ge me zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dge 'dun tshes bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bu'o// /
310b1('dul ba): bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyi dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dpya bgyid do// 'dun pa dang dgag dang yang brjod do// brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do// tshe dang ldan pa khyod
310b2('dul ba): dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye byed par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams grasan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyed pa rau spro na/
310b3('dul ba): grol te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzodadro na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi sna dge slong ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyer gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par bskos
310b4('dul ba): ste/ dge slong dgag dbye bgyid pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun dgag dbye bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol-I/ dge slong mying
310b5('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyor gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dag ga dbye bgyid par bsko na/
310b6('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par bsko bar/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag no cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs
311a1('dul ba): shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de
311a2('dul ba): bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsel/ deng ni dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bobs cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang
311a3('dul ba): deng dge 'dun dgag dbye mdzad de// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gson du gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba dang bcas
311a4('dul ba): par gyur na/ grong gi mdun du bdag cag ltung bya de ches bzhin du slar bgyi ba bdag cag la dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la/ dge slong gi mdun du ltung ba de ches bzhin du bgyid par spro ba su yang ma mchis
311a5('dul ba): na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bapA cing bzod na drug 'dun gyis gnang bar mjed cig dang / dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba de byin gyis brlabs te dgag dbye mdzad la/ slad kyis dge slong gi mdun du ltung
311a6('dul ba): ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/ bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba la dge
311b1('dul ba): ba dang yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na/ glang gi mdun du bdag cag ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi ba bdag cag las dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin
311b2('dul ba): pa rnams la dris te dogs pa dang ying gnyis bsngal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du skur bgyid par spro brasu yang mya mchis na gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing pad cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
311b3('dul ba): cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dang ltung ba de byin gyis brla byas te dgag dbye mdzod la/ slad kyis dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang // ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te dogs pa dang yid gnyis bsal
311b4('dul ba): la/ ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsole/ deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lcags lnga/ bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba'i
311b5('dul ba): slad du rtsod par gyur na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba'i slad du rtsod pa de byin gyis brlabs te dgag dbye mdzad la slad kyis
311b6('dul ba): dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te rtsod pa zhi bar bgyis la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol
312a1('dul ba): deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa la/ bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba la nges pa nyid ma lags par gyur na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
312a2('dul ba): cig dang / dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba la nges pa nyid me lags pa du byin gyis brlabs te dug gi dbye mdzad la/ slad kyis dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dung ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te nges pa
312a3('dul ba): nyid ma lags pa bsal la ltung nga ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// tshe dang ljon pa dgongs su gsol/ deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags te/ bdag slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag
312a4('dul ba): dbye yang bco lnga pa lags na/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams
312a5('dul ba): kyis bdag la gdam su gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis bdag rjes su bstan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis bdag la rjes su gzung du gsol/ thugs brtse ba can tsho dang ldan pa rnams kyis thugs rtse ba/
312a6('dul ba): slong du bdag la thugs rtse bar mdzad du gsol/ ltung ba shes shing mthong ni chos bzhin 'dul ba bzhin du slar bgyi'o// lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yin no// leg so// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
312b1('dul ba): gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'di na dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis dgag dbye mdzad lags so// legs par dgag dbye mdzad do// shin tu dgag dbye mjed do// btsun pa lngas 'di lta bus kyang dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
312b2('dul ba): la dgag dbye bgyir rung ngo // de'i 'og tu dge tshul rnams la dgag dbye bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong ma rnams la'o// dge slong bzhi man tshad kyis 'i byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// deng dge 'dun gyis dgag dbye bco lnga pa
312b3('dul ba): yin la/ bdag dge slong ming 'dri zhes bya ba dgag dbye yang bco lnga po yin te/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba dgug dbye byin gyis brla'o// gang gi tshe dge 'dun tshogs pa de'i tshe bdag la mthong po dang thos pa
312b4('dul ba): pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyer gnas pa'i dge 'dun le dgag dbye bya'o// lan gsum du bzlas/ dgog dbye'i gzhi'o// // bam po brgyad pa// sra brkyang gi gzhi'i sdom la/ sra brkyang gding bar
312b5('dul ba): byed pa dang // 'ding dang glo byed 'byin pa'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gasrol/ 'di ltar gnas 'di na dbyar gnos pa'i dge 'dun gyis gos kyi rnyed pa'i chos gos bgyid pa 'di dge 'dun gyis sro brkyang du bzhed
312b6('dul ba): no/ gal te dge 'dun gyi bu 'bob cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu bo dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya
313a1('dul ba): ba'i chos yongasu spyad pa'i slad du chos gos sra brkyang du bgyis te/ gnas gang du sra brkyang bting bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral nu gsar pa rnams dang lta ci smos/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun
313a2('dul ba): btsun ba rnams gsun du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyeng pa'i chos gos bgyis pa 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang du bzhes pas/ de'i slad du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge
313a3('dul ba): slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu spyad pa'i slad du dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyis te/ gnas gang du sra brkyang bting bar chos gos
313a4('dul ba): rnying pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral na gsar ba rnams dang lta ci smos te/ chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyi bar tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge
313a5('dul ba): 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brgyad du bgyis lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis sra brgya
313a6('dul ba): 'ding bar spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar spron/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge
313b1('dul ba): 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos te/ dge slong sra brkyang 'ding ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas bI/
313b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyuraro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar spro na/ de'i slad du dge 'dun
313b3('dul ba): gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bsko ste/ dge slong sra brkyang 'ding ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur na/ dge slong
313b4('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bsko bar tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gleng dag mi bzod pa de drag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod
313b5('dul ba): cing glan nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bo dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan
313b6('dul ba): du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang du blo mthun par bgyis pa lags/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ni sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun
314a1('dul ba): gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di lta ste gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde bya la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyis sbyin pa'i bya ba'i chos yongasu spyad pa'i slad du dge 'dun gyi sa/
314a2('dul ba): chos gos 'di sra brkyang 'ding ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtod cing / sra brkyang 'ding ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba chos gos 'dis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dong bar 'gyur te/ gnas gang
314a3('dul ba): du sra brkyang bting bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang mi 'bral na gsar pa rnams dang lta ci smos/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gosan du gsol/ chos gis 'di ni dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang du blo mthun
314a4('dul ba): b+hAbA rI bigyis pa lags/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni smra brkyang 'dring baR+Sha bskos lags te/ 'di lta ste gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi bu dang / sbyin pa po rnam
314a5('dul ba): kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu spyad pa'i slad du bdag sra brkyang 'ding po dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gro dang bur bgyi'o gnas gang du sra brkyang gding bar chos rnyid b+ha rnam
314a6('dul ba): dang yang mi 'bral na gsar pa rnams dang lta ci smos/ len gsum du bzlas/ gnas brtan nam btsun pa 'am tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du blo mthun par bgyis
314b1('dul ba): pA lags/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos pa lags te/ de'i slad du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi
314b2('dul ba): sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu spyad pa'i slad du bdag sra brkyang gding ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gis 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting lags te/ gnas gang du sra brkyang bting bar chos gos rnying pa
314b3('dul ba): rnams dang yang mi 'bral na gsar pa rnams dang / lte ci smos/ lan gsum du bzlas/ legs par bting ngo // shin tu bting ngo // 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon gang yod pa de bdag gi yino// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
314b4('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge sbyong gi dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ba las de'i rje su 'jug pa'i dus rdzogs te/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig
314b5('dul ba): dang / dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gosan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting ba las de'i rjesu 'jug pa'i dus
314b6('dul ba): rdzogs te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin na/ sra brkyang 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang
315a1('dul ba): bo ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang phyung lcags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung ba'i de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun
315a2('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags na gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na
315a3('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / tshem rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams l-I brten te dge 'dun sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// duge 'dun btsun po rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar
315a4('dul ba): gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bi ting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags te/ ngo'i slad du tshem rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la bar+t+ta nA nas dge 'dun gyis sra
315a5('dul ba): byabyurlung 'byin pa mdzad na/ chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten te sra brkyang 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs
315a6('dul ba): shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyi bzod cing gnang nas/ chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dag 'dun gyis sa brkyang
315b1('dul ba): phyung lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// sra brkyang gi gzhi'o// // gros kyi gzhi dang nye ba'i gros kyi gzhi'i sdom la/ shi dang nor 'dra snod 'gyed dang // bcu gsum drung ni rung byu b+ha// dge
315b2('dul ba): 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus lnga bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga'
315b3('dul ba): gum pa'i rdzas bgo bar bgyi ba gum pa'i yo byad chos dang chos gos ma lags pa gda' ba dang mA ganga' ba byin gyis bArla bo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas
315b4('dul ba): 'dir dge slong gre skyes gum par gyur na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong kun dga' bo nor dang 'dra bas dge slong gre skyes gum
315b5('dul ba): bya'i rdzas bgo bar bgyi ba gum+b+ha bI'i yo byud chos gos dang chos gos ma lags pa gda' b+ha dang mi ganga' ba byin gyis brlab bo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// gis kyi gzhi'o// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyed druge 'dun gyi
315b6('dul ba): snod spyad 'gyed par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bo 'od dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzed na
316a1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis gnang bArA mdzod cig dang // dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyang 'gyed par bsko ste/ dge slong snod sbyang 'gyed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bla 'di dag
316a2('dul ba): 'dun gyis snod spyad 'gyed par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// ngage 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'dra zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyid por spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis drage
316a3('dul ba): slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par bsko ste/ dge slong snod spyad 'gyed pa mi dri 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyang 'gyed par 'gyur na tshe dang ldan pa gang dge dge slong ming 'di zhes

316b1('dul ba): dang / rdul gzan gyi gzan dang / gdong phyis dang / rnag gzan dang / g.yan pa dag bu pa dang / skra bzed dang / gding ba dang / dbyar gyi gos ras chen la yang brjod par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ gos 'di bdag dang grogs
316b2('dul ba): tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mkho ba'i yo byad kyis gosu byin gyis brla'o// lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yi no// legaso// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i chos gos lhag pa rung bar me bgyis
316b3('dul ba): par 'os pa 'di mkhan pr-i la rung bar bgyi'o// mkhan po la yid brtan te bcang bar bgyi'o// rkyen ji lta bu bzhin du bgyi'o// lan gsum du bzlas/ thubs yin no// legaso// ges kyi gzhi dang / nye ba'i gos kyi gzhi'o//

316b5('dul ba): dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyir bgyi bur thun tshod du rung bar byin+da gyis bArlab bo// lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yi no// leg s+ho// zhag bdun pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bo'i bar du bcang ba dag la yang de
316b6('dul ba): bzhi no// dge slong lag gi blo rdo bteg pa na de'i dang por gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par 'gyur ba'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya'o// dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis sems
317a1('dul ba): bsdu bas tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par 'gyur bar sems bsdus shig ces sems bsdu bar bya'o// dge slong ji snyed der phyin pa thams cad kyi gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun

317a6('dul ba): lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par bgyi na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'i ma bgyis pa 'am lags pa nang mtshams dang
317b1('dul ba): phyi rol tu nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dug 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas

318a1('dul ba): gleng bar spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di re lde'i la song ste/ dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nabs so la dge sbyong gi ches ma lags

320a5('dul ba): stsol ba dang 'byin pa mdzad pasuM lung mnod pa dang / klag+sa pa dang / tI nu bam+hi ba dang / rnyil 'byor dang / yid la bgyi ba dang / nang du sems zhi gan su bAm+b+hi be shar na/ gal ti dge 'dun gyi dus la bab tsong bzod na

321a5('dul ba): gyur cing dge 'dun lA s+t+waM snyol bar bgyid// 'byung bar duskyed/ mtshungs par nye bar sten la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing ltung ba rgyun tu bgyid pa de 'dra spong ngo zhes mchi na/ gal te dge 'dun
321a6('dul ba): gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong dge ldan smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnam
321b1('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun tu bgyid pa 'di dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du bgyid de/ ltung ba rgyun tu bgyid pa ma btang ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis smad pa'i phrin las mjed lags te/ dge slong
321b2('dul ba): dge ldan 'di smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags byas skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/ bzod
321b3('dul ba): pa gsol zhing ltung ba rkyen du bgyid pa de yang spong ngo zhes mchi na/ de'i slad du dge slong dge ldan smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la dge 'dun gyis bzod pa mdzad na/ dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dge ldan
321b4('dul ba): smad ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa nga drug ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsuM
321b5('dul ba): du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong dge ldan smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lpags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bras de de bzhin du 'dzin te// dge
321b6('dul ba): 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nabaso 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa lags te/ 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin par yang snang zhing thos la
322a1('dul ba): 'tshal/ 'di gnyis sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod par yang snang zhing thos la 'tshal na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro
322a2('dul ba): mgyogs dang nub so khyim sun 'byin pa mA btang ba la bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'gro u gyogs dad nang so 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i
322a3('dul ba): chos kun tu spyod pa logs te/ 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin par yang snang zhing thos la 'tshal/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod par yang snang zhing thos la 'tshal te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mo gyogs drang
322a4('dul ba): nabuso khyim ston pa ma btang ba la bskrad pa'i pin las mdzud na tshe dang ldan pa gang dang dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nabs so la bskang pa'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi
322a5('dul ba): bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du ldan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nabs so khyim sun
322a6('dul ba): 'byin pa ma btang ba la bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad legs te/ 'di ltar cang mo gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin te// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag cag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang na bos khyim
322b1('dul ba): sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa lags pas bdag cag la dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ bdag cag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nabaso bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas sku
322b2('dul ba): 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing / dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston+ya la/ mtshams kyi nang du murmis te bzod pa gsol zhing khyim 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyong pa
322b3('dul ba): de yang spong na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du blodag cag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nA bso bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod po mdza dra du gsol/ lan gsum du
322b4('dul ba): bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsil/ dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i ches kun tu spyod pa lags te/ 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin parar+ya snang zhing thos la
322b5('dul ba): 'tshi lnga/ 'di gnyis sdigs pa'i chos kun tu spyod par yang snang zhing thos la 'tshal te/ khyim su ni 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa ma btang ba 'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i dri ni yas ma dzAd lags
322b6('dul ba): te 'di gnyis bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad logs pas snyi 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur tsong dge 'dren la skra snyol bar pa gyod/ 'byung bar 'baskod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la/ mtshams kyi nang /
323a1('dul ba): mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa de yang skrod dro zhes mchi na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge
323a2('dul ba): slong 'gro mgyogs dang nang so bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad pa lags pa la dge 'dun gyis bzod pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so 'di gnyis
323a3('dul ba): khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pas 'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nabs sku 'greng par gyur/ sgra 'phyar
323a4('dul ba): bor gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyod/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsel zhing khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa de yang spong ngo zhes
323a5('dul ba): mchis pa la bzod pa mdzad ni tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nabs bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lcogs pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cung ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod
323a6('dul ba): ba de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so bskrad pa'i phrin
323b1('dul ba): las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dram pa 'di khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid na gal te dge 'dun
323b2('dul ba): gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzad cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa
323b3('dul ba): rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dam pa 'di khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa
323b4('dul ba): gang dag dge slong dam pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang mi gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dadra po ste/
323b5('dul ba): de bzhin du ldan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la sla 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cing mi
323b6('dul ba): gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pas bdag la dge 'dun gyis slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/
324a1('dul ba): bdag dge sbyong dam pa slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags byas skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston lnga mtshams
324a2('dul ba): kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa du yang spong na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong dam pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phyin las
324a3('dul ba): mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du go sngo lnga/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dam bu 'di khyim pA la brnyas thabs bgyid pas de la dge 'dun gyis slar 'gyed pa'i phrin
324a4('dul ba): las mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu stsol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du
324a5('dul ba): mchis te bzod pa gsel zhing khyim pa la bArnyes thabs bgyid pa de yang spyod dro zhes mchi na/ gal to dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzed na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge slong dam pa slar 'gyed pa'i
324a6('dul ba): phrin las mdzad lags pa lo dge 'dun gyis bzod pa mdzad do// 'din gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun po rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dam pa 'di khyim pa la brnyes thabs bgyis pas de la dge 'dun gyis
324b1('dul ba): slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing duge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar skyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston ga
324b2('dul ba): mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa de 'dra spong ngo zhes mchi ba lnga bzod pa mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dam pa slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags
324b3('dul ba): pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
324b4('dul ba): gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa la 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas dri de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsen du gsol/
324b5('dul ba): dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/ de la dge slong rnams kyis gleng zhing dran par gyis kyang ltung ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzed na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
324b6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ngam mthong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzadado// 'di ni gsol pa'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/ dge slong
325a1('dul ba): rnams kyis glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang ltung ba ma mthong ngo // zhes mchi ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba mu mthong ba la/ gnas nus dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad na/ tshe
325a2('dul ba): dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'dun pa gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mjed par bzod pa de dag ni cing ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod sde dang po ste/ de bzhin
325a3('dul ba): du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad legs te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung
325a4('dul ba): bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong 'dun pa la ltung ba byung bas dge 'dun gyis bdag 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las
325a5('dul ba): mdzod legs te/ bdag dge slong 'dun pa ltung bla ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lcags pas sgyu 'greng bar gyur/ sku 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar
325a6('dul ba): bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/ bzod pa gsol zhing ltung ba de yang spong na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'dun
325b1('dul ba): pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste//
325b2('dul ba): ltung ba ma mthong ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnang nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/ sku
325b3('dul ba): 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing ltung ba de yang mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi
325b4('dul ba): dus la babo cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol
325b5('dul ba): ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/ ltung ba ma mthong ba 'di la dge 'dun gyi sa gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad legs te/ dge slong 'dun
325b6('dul ba): pa ltung ba ma mthong ba gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad legs pas skra 'greng par gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston
326a1('dul ba): la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod par gsol zhing ltung ba de yang ma mthong ngo zhes mchis pas de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las/
326a2('dul ba): mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag dang dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthang bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad la gis pa la bzod pa mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag dang drage
326a3('dul ba): slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cing ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni/
326a4('dul ba): las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du ldan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad/
326a5('dul ba): lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de du bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'dun pa 'di'i ltung ba byung yang de chos bzhin du
326a6('dul ba): slar mi 'chos na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba slar mi 'chos pa de la gnas nas dbyung
326b1('dul ba): ba'i phrin las mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'dun pa 'di ltung ba byung yang chos bzhin du slar mi 'chos pas/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba chos
326b2('dul ba): bzhin du slar mi 'chos pa 'di la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/
326b3('dul ba): gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gan du nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba slar mi
326b4('dul ba): 'chos pa la gnas nas dbyung bya'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung byas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba byung ba la ltung
326b5('dul ba): ba de chos bzhin du slar mi 'chos pas/ bdag ltung ba slar mi 'chos pa la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ bdag dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i
326b6('dul ba): phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur zhing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing
327a1('dul ba): ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du slar 'chos na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs rtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong bdun pa slar myi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las
327a2('dul ba): mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/ ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mi 'chos pas 'di la dge 'dun
327a3('dul ba): gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'tshes pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phyin las mdzad lags pas 'di skra 'gro bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu stem
327a4('dul ba): bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mu tshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/ bzod pa gsol zhing ltung ba de la yang chos bzhin du slar 'chos so zhes mchis na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod
327a5('dul ba): na dge 'dun gyis gnang por mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzod lags pa la bzod pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun
327a6('dul ba): pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/ ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mi 'chos pas 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ dge slong 'dun pa
327b1('dul ba): slar mi mchis pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'di skra 'gred par gyur/ skra 'phyar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la/ mtshams kyi nang
327b2('dul ba): du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing slar 'chos so zhes mchis pas de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan
327b3('dul ba): pa glang dag dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cing ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/
327b4('dul ba): 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las
327b5('dul ba): mdzad lags pa lnga bzod pa mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung byas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsolnga/ dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa
327b6('dul ba): 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bstan kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa
328a1('dul ba): bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas/ 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/ 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos sgro yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di
328a2('dul ba): nyid badren gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjesu kyang 'dogs te/ 'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/ 'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i lus kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu
328a3('dul ba): bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyis gzhan ni rdzun pa'o zhes rje su tha snyad 'dogs na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas
328a4('dul ba): sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las bgyis te/ ji skyid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thams ca
328a5('dul ba): du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/ phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi'o// 'dri ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams glasan du gsol/
328a6('dul ba): dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i cho su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/ de
328b1('dul ba): ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgre na/ 'di la dge slong rab tu mad+ma pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta bu'i rnam pa de nyid la nan/
328b2('dul ba): gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni rdzun pa'o zhes rje su tha snyad 'dogs te/ 'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/ 'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo
328b3('dul ba): yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhi dri mngon par zhen nas 'dri nyid bden gyi gzhan ni rdzun pa'o// zhes rje su tha snyad 'dogs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can
328b4('dul ba): gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i lAs+t+ra bgrI ste/ ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig+sas pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams kyi thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong
328b5('dul ba): de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdil bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa
328b6('dul ba): pa can gyi lte ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la ni gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyi zhing ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid
329a1('dul ba): du gtum 'dre bar mi bgyi/ phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag
329a2('dul ba): ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyi bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig patsun gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la glunas
329a3('dul ba): nus dbyung ba'i phrin lngas mdzad cing ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta bA'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi
329a4('dul ba): phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing / dper na gdol bu bzhin du smod par bgyis shing mchog tu smad par bgyid lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du

329a6('dul ba): 'gyur te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis sheso zhes mchis pas dge 'dun gyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags te/
329b1('dul ba): bdag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod//

329b3('dul ba): lhas sdig pa n+dan gyi lta ba'i rnam pa btang lags pa la bzod bu mdzad du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'chi ltas lA sdig bya can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta ba
329b4('dul ba): 'di byung ste/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chosu gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bstan kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so/
329b5('dul ba): zhes mchi nas/ dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags te/ dge slong 'chi ltas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad

330a1('dul ba): lta ba'i rnam pA de yang gtong ngo zhes mchi na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bya ba rji bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdigs pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi

335a6('dul ba): byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pas/ bdag dge slong 'char ka dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/ che ge me las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung li zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las zla ba phyed spo ba
335b1('dul ba): gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsal te/ bdag spo ba bgyid bzhin pa las yang dge 'dun
335b2('dul ba): lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung lnga bcabs la/ bdag dge slong 'char ka dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/ dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung nas bcabs pa de'i
335b3('dul ba): slad du dge 'dun lngas gzhi nas spro ba gsol nas dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung nas bcabs pa de'i slad du gzhi nas spo ba stsal te/ bdag
335b4('dul ba): gzhi nas spro ba bgyid bzhin pa las dge 'dun lhag ma'i lteng ltung ba snga mu dang 'dra ba yang bldabs te byung nas bcabs te bdag dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba pa ru ma dang 'dra ba yang bldabs te byung nas

335b6('dul ba): ltung ba bar ma 'dra ba yang bldabs te byung nas bcabs pa de'i slad du gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba stsal du gsol/ lon gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'char ka 'di la che
335'a1('dul ba): ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba zla ba phyed bcabs pas dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/ che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyad
335'a2('dul ba): bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las zla ba phyed spo ba gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du spo ba stsal te/ 'di

339a5('dul ba): dang / gti mug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston bzhin du khyod kyis mi mdzes pa 'di lta bu 'di byas pa mi rig so// mi gti mug can khyod kyis

339b2('dul ba): par gyur to// 'char ka gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sgron ma dang / chos kyi snong pa dang / chos kyi 'od dang / chos kyi gsal ba dang / chos kyi snang ba gsal po dang / chos kyi mar mi dang / chos kyi rab gsal med par byed pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/
