341a1('dul ba): shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du ldan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ drage 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la chu ga mo las byung ba'i ngage 'dun lhag ma'i
341a2('dul ba): ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba dbyung lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas dri de bzhin du 'dzin te// 'char ka khyod nyon cig/ 'char ka khyod kyis legs pa byaso// lags pa shin tu byas// gnyis ni mkhas
341a3('dul ba): pa/ gnyis ni gsal ba/ gnyis ni dge ba/ gnyis ni skyes bu dam po ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang / ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du 'tshos pa gang yin pa'o// gnyis ni sdig pa'i rtsa ba brko ba/ rgyun las
341a4('dul ba): bzlog pa la 'bad pa/ 'bab chu dang 'khri shing skems pa/ bdud 'dul ba/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol po// ches kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ sdig pa'i rgyun bcad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
341a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang mthun pa bskor ba'i rje su bskor ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang / ltung ba byung nas ches bzhin du phyir 'chos pa gang yin pa'o// gnyis ni rnam par
341a6('dul ba): byang bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis kyi zag pa 'phel bar mi'i 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang / ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir 'chos gang
341b1('dul ba): yin pa'o// 'char ka khyod ltung ba 'di bshags shing so sor bshags pas mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang bzas la yo 'du
341b2('dul ba): shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang / spong ba'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes dang / 'am pa'i 'du shes
341b3('dul ba): dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /
341b4('dul ba): rnam par da mar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gang gi 'du shes dang / stong pa nyid du so sor rtogs pa'i 'du shes kyi 'osu gyur pa yin/ bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang /
341b5('dul ba): bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nin mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
341b6('dul ba): bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang // lha'i rna ba dang / sems kyi rnam grangs dang / bAn rgyo gnas dang / 'ichi 'pho dang skye ba dang /
342a1('dul ba): sgyus mchog dgra ma pad+mo smr-i rlung ba sbyin pa'o// chu r+yag sbyang ba 'dra bshugs shAng so sor bshags pas 'gro b+ha gnyis po las gang yang rung ba zhig khyung 'gro bya yin par shes
342a2('dul ba): bar bya ste/ lha 'am/ mI la// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang las kyi mtha' mi 'chab pa'i 'gro ba ni gnyis te/ lha 'am/ mi'o// klung dag dras bshud pa la yid ches pa de dag ni 'chab par mi sems zhes gsung so// yang gsung
342a3('dul ba): bcabs pa char pa bzhin du 'bab// bshugs pa tshor bzhin 'bab myi 'gyur// de lta bas na bshags par bya// de lta char bzhin de mI 'bab ce'o// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod byung zin gyis bag yod par bsgrubs shig/
342a4('dul ba): phyir bcos pa'i gzhi'o// / bam po dgu pa ste tha ma/ phyir bcos pa'i gzhi dang nye ba'i gzhi'i sdom la/ 'dre dung phyag bya ma yin dang // bslab pa sbyin pa tha ma'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang
342a5('dul ba): ldan pa gre skyes 'di dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod ni dge 'dun gyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma rnams dang
342a6('dul ba): lhan cig gau tam 'dre zhing gnas pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad do// 'di na gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gri skyes 'di dge slong ma rnamaso dang lhan cig 'dre zhing
342b1('dul ba): gnas te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa la/ de gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma rnams dang ldan cig 'dre
342b2('dul ba): zhing gnas pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dgra mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhon du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas//
342b3('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gning nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du
342b4('dul ba): 'dzin to// dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/ 'phags pa dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad
342b5('dul ba): lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis 'phags pa dge slong gre skyes gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags la pa la phyag bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags pa'i sdom pa stsol na/ gal te dge 'dun 'phags
342b6('dul ba): ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis 'phags pa dge slong gre skyes gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la
343a1('dul ba): phyag bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags pa'i sdom pa stsol to// 'di ni gsol pa'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'phags ma dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pas dge slong
343a2('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis 'phags pa dge slong gre skyes dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la phyag bgyi

343a4('dul ba): pabar bzod pa de dag ni cang mi gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis 'phags pa gre skyes dge slong gi dge 'dun
343a5('dul ba): gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la phyag bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags pa'i sdom pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol
343a6('dul ba): li tsa byi chen pos tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la yang dag po ma lags pas skur na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'di li tsa byi chen po la ltung
343b1('dul ba): bzed kha dbub par bgyi'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag li tsa byi chen po mi dag pa'i grogs pas bslus pas 'phags pa gyad bu nor la yang dag pa mA lags pas skur bas dge
343b2('dul ba): 'dun gyis bdag la lhung bzed khas dbub pa mdzad do// bdag lhung bzed khas phub pa dge 'dun las lhung bzed slar bzlog par gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad
343b3('dul ba): du lhung bzed slar bzlog tu gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ li tsa byi chen po mi dge ba'i grogs pos bslus pa 'di/ chu dang ldan pa gyang bu nor la yang dag pa ma lags
343b4('dul ba): pas skur te/ dge 'dun gyis de la lhung bzed khas dbub pa mdzad pa las/ li tsa byi chen po lhung bzed khyas phub pa de dge 'dun las lhung bzed slar bzlog pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
343b5('dul ba): bzod ni// dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis li tsu byi chen po la lhung bzed slar bzlog pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong dga' byed
343b6('dul ba): kyis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten kyang bcab pa'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang bcab par ma bgyis te/ bdag dge slong dga' byed dge 'dun la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
344a1('dul ba): bslab pa gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dag 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtsa ba'i slad du bdag dge slongadaga' byad la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge

344a3('dul ba): dga' byed 'di dge 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol nas/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bob cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' byed la ji srid 'tsho'i
344a4('dul ba): brlar du bslab pa stsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dga' byed 'dis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa'i 'khrig po'i chos bsten kyang btsob pa'i sems
344a5('dul ba): gcig tsam gyis kyang bcab par ma bgyis pas dge slong dga' byed 'di dge 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bor du bslab pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab
344a6('dul ba): pa stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dga' byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag ma bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po

344b3('dul ba): pa 'char ka 'di dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan po'i tshig gis 'gro ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/ 'grong ba yang mi 'tshalo/ 'dug pa yang mi 'tshal/ nyal ba yang mi 'tshal/ gal te dag 'dun

344b5('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di dge bsnyen ma yang ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gista 'gro ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/ 'greng ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/ nyal ba yang mchid

345a1('dul ba): la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par sprul par bzod pa dri dag ni tsAng ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/

346a1('dul ba): bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsal bas zhag 'di snyed cig ni bgyis lags/ bgyi ba ni zhag 'di snyed cig

346a4('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bas zhag 'di snyed cig ni bgyis lags/ bgyi ba ni zhag 'di snyed cig mchis te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag mgu bar bgyi ba spyod par
346a5('dul ba): gzung du gsol// lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gson du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba spo ba bgyid pas dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ thob mo bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid
346a6('dul ba): gartsed par bgyid pa dag mchis zhes thos te/ de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/ dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gi mdun du spo ba slar btang bar bgyi'o// phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba
346b1('dul ba): de dag slar mchi nas yang spro ba blang bar bgyi'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag rang bzhin du gnas par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag dge slong spro ba bgyid pa'i dgra blo dge slong mchis te/ bdag ming 'di
346b2('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba spro ba spyod pa dag yang su bgyid cing slar yang len par bgyid do// yang blangs te spyod par bgyid na tshe dang ldan pas bdag ngo tsha ma mchis par mi gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yi no// leg so// dge 'dun btsun pa rnaM
346b3('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu bar bgyid pa/ dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ 'thab mo bgyid ga/ 'gyed par bgyid gartsod par bgyid pa/ ngag mchis zhes thos te/ de dag gis bdag la
346b4('dul ba): gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/ dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gi mdun du mgu bar bgyi ba slar btang bar bgyi'o// phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba de dge slar mchis na yang mgu bar bgyi bar blang bar bgyi'o// dge
346b5('dul ba): 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag rang bzhin du gnas par bzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag dge slong mgu bar bgyi ba'i dgra po dge slong mchis te/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu
346b6('dul ba): ba'i spyod pa bag yang su bgyid cing slar yang len par bgyid do// yang blangs te spyod par bgyid na tshe dang ldan pas bdag ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi gzung du gsol/ len gsum du bzlas/ thabs yi no// leg so// dge 'dun btsun pa
347a1('dul ba): rnams gsan du gso// bdag dge slong ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba spo ba bgyid pas dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ thab mo bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ dag mchi zhes thos te/
347a2('dul ba): de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/ dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas/ bdag gis de skad thos na dge slong rnams kyi mdun du spro ba sgyur btang ba phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba de dag slar mchis lags pas bdag spro ba
347a3('dul ba): yang slar len to// spro ba zhag 'khor ba rnams bgyi'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag spo ba bgyid par gzung du gsol/ lani gsum du bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba skye
347a4('dul ba): bapa bgyid pa'i dgra pa dge slong mchis te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas spo ba'i spyod pa bgra yang su bgyis pa dag po dge slong de dag slar mchis legs pas bdag spo ba yang slar len te// spo ba zhag 'khor ba rnams bgyi'o//
347a5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pas bdag spo ba bgyid par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yi no// leg so// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu bar bgyid pas dge slong 'thab krol 'gyid pa/
347a6('dul ba): mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa / zab mo bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ dag mtsho zhes thos te/ de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/ dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas/ bdag gis de skad thos nas dge slong
347b1('dul ba): rnams kyis mdun du mgu bar bgyi ba slar btang ba phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba de dag slar mchis lags pas/ bdag mgu bar bgyi ba yang slar lan to// mgu bar bgyi ba zhag ma khor ba rnams bgyi'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyi
347b2('dul ba): bdag mgu bar bgyid par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu bri ya bgyi ba'i dgra po dge slong mchis te/ bdag ming 'dri zhes bgyi bas mgu ba'i spyod
347b3('dul ba): pa bag yangasu bgyis pa dag po dge dge slong de dag slar mchis lags pas bdag mgu bar bgyi ba yang slar len to// mgu bar bgyi bzhag ma khor ba rnams bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pas bdag mgu bar bgyid par gzung
347b4('dul ba): du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yi no// legs// sa gzhan na gnas pa'i spyod pa'i gzhi'o// // dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di glengs shing dran par
347b5('dul ba): bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/ 'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi bgyid po nyid du rnam par bzhag cing mi gdams par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun
347b6('dul ba): gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong bzhag par bgyi'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i
348a1('dul ba): glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/ 'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi bgyi ba nyid du rnam par bzhag cing mi gdams par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed du/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge/
348a2('dul ba): slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong bzhag par bgyi na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong bzhag par bzod pa de dag ni cang a gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni lngas
348a3('dul ba): brjed pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lon gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong bzhag lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// /
348a4('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsal/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/ 'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi bgyi ba nyid du rnam par bzhug cing mi gdams par bgyis
348a5('dul ba): kyang skabs mi 'byed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi po'i dgag dbye bzhag par bgyi'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun
348a6('dul ba): ba rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/ 'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi 'gyur ba nyid du rnam par bzhag cing mi gdams par dgyis kyang skam
348b1('dul ba): mi 'byed do// de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye bzhag par bgyi na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye bzhag par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de
348b2('dul ba): dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las bzod pa drang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye bzhag lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung
348b3('dul ba): byas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// yongasu sbyang ba'i gzhi'o// // las bye ba dang / dge 'dun bye ba'i gzhi'i sdom la/ bzod pa gsol na dang mthun pa dang / gso sbyong gsol pa len 'jug pa'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gson du gsol/ bdag
348b4('dul ba): shAm+bI ba'i dge slong nang par snga zhig tu mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma me'i lung la rnam par rtog rtog na 'di snyam bgyid de/ gang las bdag cag las 'thab pa dang / 'tshong 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung ba'i gzhi ni 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung
348b5('dul ba): ngam mi byung ba dang / gnas nas phyung ngam ma phyung ba legs na/ bdag cag la ltung babyung gi ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags/ gnas nas byung ba lags kyi gnas nas ma byung ba ma lags te/ gnas nas phyung ba ni ches dang mthun pa'i phrin las
348b6('dul ba): ma 'khrugs pa bzhag par mi 'os pas bgyiso snyam bgyis nas bdag grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dge slong dang sdums bgyi zhing mthun par bgyi'o snyam ste/ bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar
349a1('dul ba): gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar
349a2('dul ba): ldog par bgyid na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lpags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan
349a3('dul ba): du gsol/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge 'dun gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lpags pa 'di skra 'greng bar gyur/ sku 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun las spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la/ mtshams kyi
349a4('dul ba): nang du mchis te bzed pa gasngal zhing gzhi gang las gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar bzlog par bgyid na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab ci bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
349a5('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis kr-i shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ kau shA m+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las
349a6('dul ba): mdzad legs pa'i skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyel bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyed/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la/ mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsal zhing gzhi gang la gnas nas
349b1('dul ba): byung b.ri sprin las mdzad ba'i gzhi de dag lus slar ldog par bgyid// de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI ba'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ko shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas
349b2('dul ba): dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis
349b3('dul ba): bzod cing gan nas/ dge 'dun gyis kau shUm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsun du
349b4('dul ba): gsel/ bdag kau shrIm+bI pa'i dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas bdag dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas dge 'dun gyis bdag lnga bzed pa mdzad lags te/ bdag gi
349b5('dul ba): shwAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyi sna thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag kr-i shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las
349b6('dul ba): mdzod lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa la mthun pa stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun btsa pa rnams gsen du gsol/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyi gin sa nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad
350a1('dul ba): lags pas/ 'di dge'abadun gyi gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis 'dri la duzod pa mdzang lags te/ kau shwAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang baHsmra pa 'di thA/
350a2('dul ba): pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsol to// 'di ni gso/
350a3('dul ba): 'o dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol kr-i shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnan dbyung ba'i phrin las mtshang lags pas byung dge 'dun gyi kun du mchi swA te bzod pa gsol nas dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod
350a4('dul ba): lags te/ shAm+bI pu'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin lis mdzad lags pa 'khor bcas pa 'di la mthun pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'azod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di
350a5('dul ba): mthun pa stsol ni// tshe dang ldan pa gang dag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsal par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi zod pa de dag ni gsung/
350a6('dul ba): shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lin gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la dang bcas pa la mthun
350b1('dul ba): pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas bdag dge 'dun gyi gan
350b2('dul ba): du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis bdag la bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ bdag bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te mthun pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis bdag
350b3('dul ba): 'khor dang bcas pa la mthun pa stsal lags pas/ bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'kho dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag
350b4('dul ba): kro shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal pa li mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyi gnas nas dbyung ba'i
350b5('dul ba): phyin las mdzad lags pas/ 'di dge 'dun gyis gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod pa'i 'phrin las mdzod lags te/ bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun
350b6('dul ba): gyi gan du mchis nas mthun pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsal lags pas/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa gsol ba 'di mthun pa'i gso sbyong gas
351a1('dul ba): na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la byab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal pa la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun
351a2('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad la Da ti/
351a3('dul ba): bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khye ra dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis nas mthun pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis ko shAm+bI paM'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsal lags pas+ya/ ko shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas
351a4('dul ba): pa mthun pa stsal pa 'di mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol te/ nga'i slad du dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa sprul pa mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa glang dag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bAHsa
351a5('dul ba): pa mthun pa sprul pa la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal par bzod pa de dag ni cing ma gsung zhi gri/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du len gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAn+tiM
351a6('dul ba): ba'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun po stsol pa la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// las bye ba'i gzhi'o// // tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sha za ste/ bdag
351b1('dul ba): n+yag gis sha bza' bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba'i phyi ro// dge sbyong gau ta mA ni 'o ma 'thung ste/ bdag cag gis btung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las beru la gnod pa'i phyiro// dge sbyong
351b2('dul ba): gau ta ma ni lan tshwa za ste/ bdog cag gis bzu' bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khu ba las gyur pa'i phyir ro// dge sbyong gau ta mA ni gos dras pa gyon te/ bdag cag gis bsgo bar mi bya'o// do tso'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin por bya ba chu so zos
351b3('dul ba): par 'gyur ba'i phyi ro// dge sbyong gau tA mA ni dgon pa na gnas par byed// bdag cag gis grong du gnas par bya'o// de ci'i ca phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya bya yongasu ma spyad par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// tshe dang ldan po dag khyod cag las
351b4('dul ba): gang brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga po 'di dag gis dag pa dang grol ba dang / nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / legs par 'dzin pa des dge sbyong gau ta ma las rong du gyis shig/ so sor gyis shig/ tha dad du gyis shig/
351b5('dul ba): rgyud bsrings shig/ thag bsrings shig// logs shig tu 'dug cig/ tshwa dang ldan pa dag dge steng gau ta ma ni shra zla ste/ bdag cag gis sha bza' bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba'i phyi ro// dge sbyong gi/
351b6('dul ba): to ma ni 'o ma 'thung ste/ bdag cag gis btung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe me/ gzhi de las bai'u la gnod pa'i phyir// dge sbyong gau ta ma ni lan tshwa za ste/ bdag gis bza' bar mi bya'o// ci'i phyir zhe na khu ba las gyur pa'i phyir// dge sbyong gau/
352a1('dul ba): ma ni gos dras pa gyon te/ bdag cag gis bge bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba chus zos pa 'gyur ba'i phyi ro// dge sbyong gau ta ma ni dgon pa na gnas par byed de/ bdag cag ni grong du
352a2('dul ba): gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba yongasu mo spyad par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// tshe dang ldan pa dge khyed cug las gang brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga po 'di dag gis dog pa dang / grol ba dang / nges par
352a3('dul ba): 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / legs par 'dzin pa nges tshul shing long zhig/ 'khor lo bye ba'i gzhi'o// // rtsod pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/ gzu dang gsal dang sbed pa dang // dge 'dun bskang gsum gnas brtan dang // 'dri ma dang
352a4('dul ba): dran dang ma smyos dang // khyed dang de dag bdug 'dun bshags// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyed dge 'dun lo rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon sum gyis 'dul bas rnam par zhi bar byed par spro 'am spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
352a5('dul ba): gsol/ gzu bo mong 'dri zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung po rnams mngon sum gyis 'dul pos rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod ni dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
352a6('dul ba): mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bgyi ste/ gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon sum gyis 'dul bas
352b1('dul ba): rjod pa rnam par lci bar bgyid do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsun du gsol// gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi bu 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro ste/ de'i skad du dag 'dun gyis ming 'di
352b2('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi brtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang mA gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs sha
352b3('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bskos lags te/ 'di cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rna
352b4('dul ba): papApar zhi bar byed par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gastsol// dge slong gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spron/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la babya cing bzongan/
352b5('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gsal bar bsko bar bgyi ste/ gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam paru zhi bar bye // 'di ni gsol bya'o// dge 'dun
352b6('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar 'gyid par bsnyen//
353a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag myi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod
353a2('dul ba): cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsgos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung
353a3('dul ba): pa rnam par zhi bar byed par spro 'am spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal bar ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro na/ gal te
353a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dus la babi cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod tsog dang / dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gsal ba'i yang gsal bar bsko bar bgyi ste/ gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi
353a5('dul ba): pa 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyi'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la brtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar
353a6('dul ba): bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa
353b1('dul ba): bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi
353b2('dul ba): par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang ming gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// mying 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong mring 'di zhes bya ba 'di dge
353b3('dul ba): 'dun gyis rtsod pa sbeng par spyon/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang par mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bsgo bar bgyi ste/ rtsod pa sbrid pa mIng 'ang
353b4('dul ba): zhes bya ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa skyed do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rgod pa steng par sngo ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes
353b5('dul ba): bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bsko na/ tshwa dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dri rtsid pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gu sung zhag/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni / sungs shig/ dge 'duni gyis bzod cing gnang
353b6('dul ba): nas dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbeng par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa 'di gnas ga ge mo zhes bgyi bar gang zag/
354a1('dul ba): che ga mo zhes bgyi ba dang / ming chag me zhes bgyi ba las gzhi 'di'i slad du byung nas yun 'di srid cig lags te/ rtsod pa 'di gzu bo rnams la phul na gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge 'dun la phul nas/
354a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bskos na/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba dgra bskos na dge slong
354a3('dul ba): gsal ba'i yang gsal ba de dag gis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las/ gsal ba rnams kyis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi brtsod pa sbed par
354a4('dul ba): bskos te/ bdag rtsod pa sdud pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/ gnas bar+d+hanA dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge bdun la dbu'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis rnyed pa 'di zla ba gsum gyi mtha' tshun chud kyis rnam par ni b+ha
354a5('dul ba): mdzud du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa dag gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa 'di gnas che ge me zhes bgyi bar/ gang ze ga ga ge mo dang / ming ge mo zhes bgyi ba las gzhi 'di'i slad du byung nas yun
354a6('dul ba): 'di srid lags te/ rtsod pa 'di gzu ba rnams la phul na/ gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge 'dun la phul na dge 'dun gyis kyang rna bar zhi ba bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal po
354b1('dul ba): dag bsgos na/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba'i yang gasngal pa drug bsgos na dge slong gsal bu'i yang gsal ba de dag gis rnam par 'i bar bgyid rngom thog ste/
354b2('dul ba): de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las gsal ba rnams kyis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis bdeg dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rdud bya sbeng bar bskos pa ste/ bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas
354b3('dul ba): rtsod pa 'di/ gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi mthe'i tshun chad du phul na/ gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/
354b4('dul ba): des kyang bdag rtsod pa sbrid pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bla la stsal nas/ bdag rtsod pa spyod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/ mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa dang se la dbu'o// mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dulta ba 'dzi
354b5('dul ba): byAbya dang / ma mai 'dzin pa rnams kyis rtsod pa 'di zla bA d+h+r-ig gi mtha' tshun chad kyis rnam par zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ glanas brtan du gsol/ cong ba 'di gnas che ga mo zhes bgyi bar/ gang zag ga ga mi zhes bgyi ba dang / ming ge mo
354b6('dul ba): bgyi ba las gzhi 'di'i slang du thung nas yun 'di srid cig lags te/ rtsod pa 'di gzu rnams la phul na gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar
355a1('dul ba): bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bskos na/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba bskos na/ dge slong gsal bya'i
355a2('dul ba): yang gsal ba de dag gis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma theg ste/ de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las/ gsal ba rnams ni dge 'dun la phul nas/ dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa skyed par bskos
355a3('dul ba): te/ bdag rtsod pa spang ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/ gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du phul na/ des kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ nges
355a4('dul ba): bdag rtsod pa spang pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la stsal nas/ bdag rtsod pa spang ba ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/ mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la zla ba drug gis mtha' tshun chad du phul na de
355a5('dul ba): dag gis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa rngom thogs nas de dag gis bdag rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba stsal te/ bdag rtsod pa spyod pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan la dbu'o// gnas brtan gyi
355a6('dul ba): rtsod pa 'di thug pa ma mchis pa tshun chad kyis rnam par zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la tshul shing brims par spro 'am/ spo'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'od
355b1('dul ba): dge 'dun la tshul shing brims par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba tshul shing brims par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong tshul shing byim
355b2('dul ba): pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba tshul shing brims mo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams glasan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la tshul shing brims par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di su
355b3('dul ba): shing brims par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di zhes tshul shing brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzed cing gnang nas//
355b4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dge slong mi'i 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di tshul shing brim par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong gyad bu nor la dge slong ma 'dzal
355b5('dul ba): myomos yang dag pa ma lags pa gsob gsog rdzun gyis skur te/ bdag la dge slong dag gis gzhi 'dis gleng bas bdag dge slong gyang bu nor dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
355b6('dul ba): kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gyed bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos yang dag pa ma lags
356a1('dul ba): pa gsob gsog rdzun gyis sbyar te/ 'di la dge slong dag gis gzhi des gleng bas dge slong gyad bu nor 'di dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
356a2('dul ba): cig dang / ngage 'dun gyis dge slong gyang bu nor 'di la dran pas 'dul ba stsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos yang dag pa ma lags bu gsob gsog
356a3('dul ba): rdzun gyis skur te/ 'di la dge slong dag gis gzhi des gleng bas dge slong gyang bu nor 'di la dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong gying bu nor 'di la dran pas 'dul ba stsol mtshe dang ldan pa gang dag
356a4('dul ba): dge slong gling bu nor 'di la dran pas 'dul ba stsal par bzod pa de dag ni cad ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi brjod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis ldan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas
356a5('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dge sbyong gyung bya nor la dran pas 'dul ba sbrul lags te/ 'di ltar cing mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge sbyong bye ma skyes smyos pa sems 'khrugs pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor
356a6('dul ba): bas gzir bas dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/ rje su mthun pa ma lags paM/ rung ba ma legs pa/ tshul dang mithun po me legs pa mang du spyad cing smras te brtsal nas mig gyur// kho chu zags/ bzhin bsgyur/ sa la 'gres lnga pa// gi nyid kyis ma
356b1('dul ba): log kyang gnyid kyis log pa ltar bcos/ ma smos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/ smra bar ma bsams kyang smras te/ bdag gis dran pa rnyed na bdag la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas bdag dge slong bya ma skyes dge 'dun la ma smos pas 'dul ba
356b2('dul ba): gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun po rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma
356b3('dul ba): skyes smos pa sems 'khrugs pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir ba 'dis dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa rjesu mthun po lags pa/ rung ba ma lags pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma lags pa/ mang du spyad cing smra te/ brtsal nas mig gyur/ kho chu na
356b4('dul ba): bzhin bsgyugs la 'gres ldog/ gnyid kyis ma log kyang gnyid kyis log pa lhor bcos/ ma smyos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/ smra bar ma bsams kyang smras te/ 'dis dran pa rnyed na 'di la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas dge slong bye ma
356b5('dul ba): skyes 'di 'i dge 'dun las ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod ni dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma skyes pas 'dul ba stsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge
356b6('dul ba): 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma skyes skyes pa sems 'khrugs pa/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir ba 'dis dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/ rjesu mthun pa mi lags pa/ rung ba ma lags pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma lags pa/
357a1('dul ba): mang du spyad cing smras te brtsal nas mig gyur/ kha chu zags/ bzhin bsgyur/ sa la 'gres ldog/ gnyid kyis ma log kyang gnyid kyis ldog pa ltar bcos/ ma smos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/ smra bar ma bsams kyang smras te/ 'dis dran pa rnyed na
357a2('dul ba): 'di la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas dge slong bya ma skyes 'di dge 'dun las ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la mi smos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong bya ma
357a3('dul ba): skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni tsang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas//
357a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smos pas 'dul ba stsal logs te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// tshe dang ldan pa gang dang bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab pa/
357a5('dul ba): gyur/ 'tshang 'bru bar gyur/ rtsod par gyur/ 'gyed par gyur cing gnas te/ phyogs dang gzhan gyis phyogasasu rnam par gnas pa ni bdag cag gis ma rnyed rnyed pa ma yino// nyes pa rnyed kyis legs par rnyed pa ma yin// kha na mA tho
357a6('dul ba): sbom po dang khyim na gnas pa la ston pa ma gtogs par gzhi 'di las khyod la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa dang / bdag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gi mdun du mthol ba dang / 'chags pa dang / mi 'chab
357b1('dul ba): dag spro'o// tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag legs par gsus pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur 'chang 'bru bar gyur/ rtsod par gyur/ 'gyed par gyur cing gnas te/ phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyog su rnam par gnas pa ni bdag cag gi
357b2('dul ba): rnyede/ rnyed pa ma yino// nyes pa rnyed kyis legs pa rnyed pa ma yino// kha na ma tho ba sgrom po dang // khyim na gnas pa la ston pa ma gtogs par ga ni 'di las khyed cag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa dang / bdag cig la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de
357b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag gi mdun du mtho'o// 'chag so// mi 'chab bAr bdag spro'o// tshe dang ljon pa dag bdag ca ga legs par gsungs pa'i cho sna 'dul ba la rab tu b+hu nas 'thab par gyur/ 'tshang 'bru bar gyur rtsod par gyur/ 'gyed par gyur
357b4('dul ba): gnas te/ phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogasu rnam par gnas pa ni bdag cag gis ma rnyed de/ rnyed pa ma yino// nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa rnyed pa ma yino// kha na ma tho ba sbom po dang / khyim na gnas pa la ston pa ma gtogs par gzhi 'di las de
357b5('dul ba): dag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa dang / bdag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa dag gi mdun du bdag mthol lo// 'chag so// mi 'tsha ga// muthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro// ma mtho
357b6('dul ba): ma bshags na ni mi 'gyuraro// lan gsum du bzlas/ ltung ba mthong ngam/ mthong ngo // phyin cad sdom mam/ sdom mo// lan gsum du bzlas/ rtsod pa'i gzhi'o// // gnas mal gyi gzhi dang nye ba'i gzhi'i sdo ma la gnas khang zas
358a1('dul ba): la bsko ba gnyis// thug pa bag chos brims pa gnyis// phran tshegs brims par byed pa dang // snod chad 'bru dang gos kyi gnyis/ dbyar gyi ras chen sde dang 'ged // mngag gzhug pa dang mdzes 'chos te// gang zag bcu dang gnyis po dang /
358a2('dul ba): ston pas yang dag bshad pa yin// lug gi bla dang log dpon dang // 'khor ba dang ni dra ba'o// ming 'di zhes bigyi ba khyod dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko bar spro 'am/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
358a3('dul ba): dge slong ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko bar spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la drab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnad par mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gan
358a4('dul ba): khang bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong lhags pa lhags pa
358a5('dul ba): rnams la gnas khang bsko bar spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas khang bsko ba spro na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming byeng zhes bgyi ba gnas khang bsgo bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag
358a6('dul ba): ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas khang bsko bar bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong rnams la
358b1('dul ba): zlas la bsko bar spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun
358b2('dul ba): gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes ba
358b3('dul ba): pa 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bskos na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la bsgo bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
358b4('dul ba): gsung zhig/ gang dag mi dazod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la bsgo bar bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de
358b5('dul ba): bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyed dge slong rnams la thug pa brims par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa brim par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun
358b6('dul ba): gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun rnams la thug pa brims par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug/
359a1('dul ba): pa brim mo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong sa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa brim par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa brims par
359a2('dul ba): bsgo na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la thug pa brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis/
359a3('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la thug pa brims par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slo rna la bag ces brims par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gas//
359a4('dul ba): du gsol/ dge slong mang 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la brag ces brim par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong
359a5('dul ba): rnams la bag ces brims par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong mid 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag ces bri mo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnam/
359a6('dul ba): la bag ces brims par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la bag ces brims par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la bag ces brims par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni//
359b1('dul ba): cad ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la bag ces brims par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin
359b2('dul ba): du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong rnams la phran tshegs brim par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyis 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshags brims par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun
359b3('dul ba): gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la phran tshigs brims par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams
359b4('dul ba): phran chags brims mo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs brims par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la
359b5('dul ba): tshigs brims par bsnyen/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la phran tshegs brims par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge
359b6('dul ba): bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la phran tshegs brims par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khong dge 'dun gyi snang spyod
360a1('dul ba): 'drub par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyis snod spyad 'drub par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
360a2('dul ba): mjed cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyang 'dru 'o// 'di ni gsol bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
360a3('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spya drub par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge
360a4('dul ba): 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnod nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub
360a5('dul ba): bapar bskos lag swA tAM/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
360a6('dul ba): dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnying pa sbed par smin/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing po zang no// dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzad cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dag slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par
360b1('dul ba): bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbeng ngo // 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed bar spro ste/
360b2('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbeng bar bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbeng bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang da
360b3('dul ba): mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbeng par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya/
360b4('dul ba): babu khyod dbyar+ya dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/
360b5('dul ba): dradage 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gros kyi rnyed pa 'ged do// 'di/
360b6('dul ba): ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyer dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro na/
361a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
361a2('dul ba): gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin te// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras
361a3('dul ba): chen sbed par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gros ras chen spring par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus lo byabo cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba
361a4('dul ba): mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi pa 'dir dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbeng por bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes gyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed do// 'di ni gsol ba
361a5('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes brtse ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyor gyi gos ras chen sbeng par bsko na/ tshe dang
361a6('dul ba): pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes brtse ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbar gyi gos ras chen sbed par bsko bar bzed pa de dag ni sa la gsungs ga/ gang dag mi sa ngo shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gam nas
361b1('dul ba): 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bu 'di dge 'dun g+hi dbyar gyi glos ras chen skyed par bsgosna lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi glos ras chen 'ged par spro 'am smo
361b2('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun+da pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gro sa chen 'geng par spro mgal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod no dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod zhig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong
361b3('dul ba): ning 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi dbyi gos ras chen 'ged par bsko bar dgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi blo 'di dge 'dun myi byar gyi gos ras chen 'ge do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
361b4('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gi dun gyi byang g+h+ri gos ros chen 'ged par bsgre na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi
361b5('dul ba): dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis du zod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gre
361b6('dul ba): ras chen 'ged par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyed dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
362a1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mungag gzhug par bsko bar bgyi
362a2('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug pa bgyi // 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par smra ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi
362a3('dul ba): papa 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mngag gzhug par bsko bar bzed pa de dag ni cung ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
362a4('dul ba): gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyong dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'tshe su spro 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun
362a5('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gson du gso dge sbyong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'cho su snro na/ galA te dge 'dun gyi dus la dab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes
362a6('dul ba): ba 'od mdzes 'cho su bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos bgyid do// 'di ni gsal ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos
362b1('dul ba): spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bya 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'cho su bsgo na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'cho su bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig// gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni
362b2('dul ba): gsungs shig/ dge 'du na gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyis mdzes 'cho su bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// sngar spyad brims pa dang / gnas
362b3('dul ba): 'dog pra dang / gnas mal byi bo 'bog pa dang / shing tog brims pa dang / chu'i zhal ta pa dang / brang rim gyi zhal ta pa dang / spre'u chung srung ba dang / sra brkyang sbed pa dag ni las snga ma dag gis khongasu 'du so// ming 'di zhes bya bo khyod lag gi blararA b+h+yo /
362b4('dul ba): spyispro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gso gdage slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lagu gi b+hur spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzang na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong mong 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
362b5('dul ba): gi blar bsgre bar ba gyid te/ dge slong ming+ge 'dri zhes bgyi ba lAg gi blar bgyi // 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsun du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lug gi blar spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi bla
362b6('dul ba): bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag blar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod po de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
363a1('dul ba): 'di lhag gi blar bsko lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin te// lhag dpon ni lag gi bla'i khongasu 'du so// gnas mal gyi gzhi'o// // dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi
363a2('dul ba): ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyams chung la bro 'tshal zhi/ nga sbyor mi bzod de dge 'dun las 'khor ba'i gnang ba gsol na thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing
363a3('dul ba): nyam chung la bre 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa las 'khar ba'i gnang ba stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal ba sbyor mi bzod
363a4('dul ba): pa 'di dge 'dun las 'khar ba gnang bar gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dri rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal cing /
363a5('dul ba): sbyor mi bzod pa la 'khar ba'i gnang ba stsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khyogs shing nyam chung la sbyor mi bzod de// dge 'dun las 'khar ba gnang ba
363a6('dul ba): gsolan/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'i khegs shing nyam chung la bri'i tshal zhing sbyor mi 'azod pa la 'khar ba gnang ba gsol na/ me dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong minga'ang zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shi
363b1('dul ba): nyams chung la bro 'tshal cing sbyor mi bzod pa la 'khar ba gnang ba stsal par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes
363b2('dul ba): bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyim chung la bro 'tshal cing sbyo mi bzod pa la 'khar ba gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
363b3('dul ba): bya ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung le blo 'tshal cing sbyor mi bzod de/ dge 'dun las dra ba gnang ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas
363b4('dul ba): 'khrogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal cing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba snang ba stsal du gsol/ ldan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la
363b5('dul ba): bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa 'di dge 'dun las dra ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bya rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung
363b6('dul ba): la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod/ dge 'dun las dra
364a1('dul ba): ba gnang ba gsol/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas
364a2('dul ba): 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mo bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag nI cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi
364a3('dul ba): brgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la blo 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// 'khar ba dang dra ba gnyis ga'i gnang ba sbyin pa ni las snga ma gnyis ka'i khongs su
364a4('dul ba): 'duso// gnas mal gyi gzhi dang nye ba'i gzhi'o// // las kyi grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu nges por ga las shes she na/ gtam gyi gzhi las las kyis grangs brjod pa la/ btsun pa las drug tu mchis/ nye bar 'khor brgya rtsa gcig go//
364a5('dul ba): btsun pa las du dag gis las thams cad bsdus/ nye bar 'khor gsum gyis te/ gsum gang zhe na/ gsol ba'i las dang / gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis s+ho// btsun pa las brgya rtsa gcig po gang
364a6('dul ba): dag legs pa de dag ni gsol ba'i las dag ni du/ gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las dag ni du/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las dag ni du mchis bka' stsal pa nye bar 'khor/ gsol ba'i las ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// gsol ba dang gnyis
364b1('dul ba): kyis las ni bzhi bcu rtsa bdu'o// gsol ba dang bzhi'i las ni sum cu'o zhes gsung so// de las gsol ba'i las nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon gyis bar chad kyi chos rnams gsang ste dri ba'i phyir gsol ba
364b2('dul ba): 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / las byed pa'i slob dpon gyis par chad kyi chos rnams dag 'dun gyi nang du dri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya ba dang / so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /
364b3('dul ba): gso sbyong de la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya ba dang / gso sbyong gi tshe ltung ba de la dge 'dun tha~Md yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na/ gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya ba dang / gso
364b4('dul ba): nga gi tshe dge 'dun ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par gyur na gsol pa 'ba' zhig gis las bya ba dang / gso sbyong gi tshe ltung de ni gang yin pa de las ji ltar ni ldang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa nyid ma yin par gyur na de'i tshe
364b5('dul ba): gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dgag dbye bya ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya ba dang / dgag dbye de la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya ba dang / dgag dbye'i tshe lang ba/
364b6('dul ba): de la dge 'dun thams cad yong gnyis dang bcas par gyur na/ gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dag go dbye'i tshe dge 'dun ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya ba dang / dgag dbye'i tshe ltung ba/
365a1('dul ba): ni gang yin de las ji ltar ni ldang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa nyid ma yin par gyur na/ de'i tshe gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas par khas blang ba'i tshe gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las
365a2('dul ba): bya ba dang / shi ba'i rjes dang / shi ba'i nor dang 'dra ba'i gang zag byin gyis brlabs pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos skya brkyang de'i dge slong la gtad ba dang / gyang bu nor lta bu
365a3('dul ba): chos gos gsum ngan pa la dge 'dun gyis rus yug chen sbyin pa la gsol ba la 'ba' zhig gis las bya ba dang / dge slong dong dge slong ma gang dag ji ltar skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de ltar khyim
365a4('dul ba): rnams spyod par byed bar khyim rnams so sor go bar byed du gzhug pa la sogs pa 'ba' zhig gi las bya blo dang / ngor 'phya ba'i grangasu gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / gzhog 'phyas byed pa'i gringasu gzhug po la
365a5('dul ba): gsol bya 'dra'i zhog gi ltos bya ba dang / bsgo ba rna la gzon po'i grangasu gzhug pa la gsol ba dang 'ba' zhig gis las bya bo dang / cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangasu gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / sbyin bdag
365a6('dul ba): longs spyod 'gribs pa'i khyim du zan mi bza' ba'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / khyim gyi sdom pa byin pa de nyid gzhig pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / khyim bdag dge slong la yang dag pa ma yI
365b1('dul ba): bas skur pa 'debs pa'i khyim du lhung bzed khwas dbug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / lhung bzed khas phub pa de nyid gzod pa gsol ba'i khyim du de bzlog par bya ba la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya'o// gsol ba dang gnyis
365b2('dul ba): kyi lasI bzhi bcu rtsa bdun gong zhe na/ gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya ba la gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / kyil 'khor ba dang / mtshams chen po dang / mtshams bu chung bcas pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang //
365b3('dul ba): chen po bcad pa'i nang du chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnad pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong smyos shing sems 'khrugs pa las kyi gnasu rang 'ong byed pa mi mthun par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas
365b4('dul ba): ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong bsgo ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyis las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas par khas lon pa rnams la gnas mal spobs pa'i
365b5('dul ba): dge slong bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / rung ba'i khang pa la blo mthun par bya ba la gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i doge 'dun las sra brkyang la blo mthun par bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi wa
365b6('dul ba): bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa bskabal gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / lag gi blo dang lag pong bsko ba la gsol pa
366a1('dul ba): dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / gnas khang bsko bar bsko ba la gsol ba gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / zas la bsko bar bsko ba la gsol ba gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / thug pa brims pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /
366a2('dul ba): bag cos brims pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / phran tshegs brims pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / snod spyad 'drub pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gyi gos rnyed pa sbed pa sko ba la
366a3('dul ba): gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gyi gos rnyed po 'ged pa bsko ba la gsol pa gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gyi gosau ras chen sbed pa bsko ba la gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / ra gyi gle rwa chan dested pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang nyaM kyis bya dang / dgra gzhu
366a4('dul ba): gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / mdzes 'chos bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba mngon sum gyis 'dul ba'i gzu bo bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba gzu bos
366a5('dul ba): zhi bar ma nus na dge 'dun nu ma gzu bo rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa'i gang zag gsal ba dang gsal ba'i yang gsal ba bsko ba la gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba gang zag gsal ba dang gsal ba yang
366a6('dul ba): gsal bas zhi bar ma nus te dge 'dun la phul ba na dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed pa'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba'i tshe tshul shing drims par gang zag bsko ba la gsol pa dang gnyis kyi
366a7('dul ba): las bya ba dang / dge slong khang pa'i gzhi rung ba bstan pa ga sol ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong gitsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba bstan pa gsol ba a gsol ba gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /
366b1('dul ba): de klong kyim sum byin pa la dge sbyong chos ma yin pa rna ba mang pos gleng pa'i gang zag bsgo ba la gsol pa dang ga nyi kyi bya ba dang / rgan pong nang pa la snum sna nga sbrul bA ni 'byu rjigad+hA sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong dag gi Ta
366b2('dul ba): drug tshun chang du ston gyi gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa brim pa'i gang zag bsgo ba la gsol ba deng / gnyis kyi los bya ba dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma phol po che ma dang bar rig par 'gyur/
366b3('dul ba): ba de ltar khyim rnams so sor go bar byed pa'i gang zag bsgo ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma'i ston pa bsgo ba lnga gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / so sor bshags pa'i nyes pa spang ba'i phyir gang zag nags nyul
366b4('dul ba): ba bsgo ba lo gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong dge 'dun gyis gnas nas byung ba la dge sbyong mas phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong mo 'khor skyong nus pa
366b5('dul ba): 'khor nye bur 'jog pa'i gnang ba sbyin po la gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma 'khor skyong nus pa dang / lo bcu gnyis pa la 'khor ming po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi los bya ba dang / dge
366b6('dul ba): slong rgan po dang nang pa la 'khar ba gi nang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong rgan po dang na ba la dra ba gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba~M dang / gtsug lag khang mtshams tha dod pa gnyis
367a1('dul ba): kyi rnyed pa gcig tu bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma'i bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba tshangs par spyod pa la
367a2('dul ba): gnas pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong mo bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong mu ge'i sdug bsngal byung ba'i tshe
367a3('dul ba): rnams dang lhan cig 'brel pa'i nye bar spyod pa gnang ba sbyin po la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa dge 'dun gyi ched la zhag bzhi bcu mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol
367a4('dul ba): ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / gsol pa dang bzhi'i las sum cu gang zhe na/ dge slo dang dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / mu stegs can+da rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zla ba bzhi'i
367a5('dul ba): bar du mkhan pos sbyar ba'i gos kyis gnas ma sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor ba mtshams chen po dang mtshams bu chung dgrol po la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / gnas nas phyung
367a6('dul ba): bzod pa'i las byas pa mthun pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / mthun pa byin pa mthun pa'i gso sbyong sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / nan tur gyi las bsdigs pa dang / smang ba dang / bskrang pa dang / phyir
367b1('dul ba): 'gyed pa dang / ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / de dag la bzod pa bya ba la sogs pa dang bzhi'i las
367b2('dul ba): bya ba dang / gso sbyong bzhag pa dang / dgag dbye bzhog par bya ba dag la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / spo ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gzhi'i las bya ba dang / mgu bar bya ba sbyin po la gasnol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba
367b3('dul ba): dang gzhi nas spong sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa la gsol po dang / bzhi'i las bya ba dang / yang gAzhi
367b4('dul ba): nas bslang ste mgu bor bya ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byu bu dang / dge 'dun lhag ma las dbyung ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i lus bya ba dang / sra brkyang dbyung ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dran pas 'dul ba sbyin
367b5('dul ba): pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i los bya ba dang / ma smyos pas 'al po sbyin pa la gsol pa dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen bye
367b6('dul ba): pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / de'i rje su phyogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las bya ba dang / khyim sun 'byin pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi
368a1('dul ba): las bya ba dang / bka' blo mi byede pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo bya la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong dang ngag tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang
368a2('dul ba): bzhi'i las bya ba dang / gnos nas phyung ba'i rjesu phyogs pa'i dge slong ma bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol po dang bzhi'i las bye ba dang / dge slong ma dkon mchog gtong ba zlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya
368a3('dul ba): bapa dang / dge slong ma 'thab krol byed pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong ma sde zhing gnas pa zlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol pa dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong ma sde zhing gnasu 'dzung
368a4('dul ba): pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba bsnyil ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ba la bslab pa sbyin
368a5('dul ba): pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba'o// las rnams kyi bsngo ba'i tshigs su bcang pa ni 'di dag yin te/ gsang dang nang du dri phyir dang // gso sbyong de la ltung bcas dang / de la dge 'dun yid gnyis dang // rtsod dang nges nyid
368a6('dul ba): ma yin dang // de yi don du lnga po dag/ thams cad dgag dbyer gtogs pa yin// dbyar gnas khas blang nyid dang ni/ shi ba'i rdzas dang nor 'dra dang // chos gos sra brkyang gtad pa dang // ches gos sbyin par bya ba dang // gnas
368b1('dul ba): drun len ni brjod pa dang // klungs su gzhug pa bzhi dag dang // khyim gyi sdom dang de gzhig dang // lhung bzed khas dbub bya ba dang // de nyid bzlog par bya ba dag/ gsol ba 'ba' zhig las yi no// gnas dang mtshams
368b2('dul ba): ni gsum po dang // mi 'bral skyes dang dgag dbye dang // gnas mal stobs par byed pa dang // rung bas si gzhi bsgo ba dang // sgo brgyang dang ni de 'dir dang // spong dang lag gi bla dang ni// gnas khang bsgo la sogs pa dang // gzu dang
368b3('dul ba): gsalnga dang sbed pa dang // tshul shing brims par byed pa dang // khang pa khang chen posten pa dang // glang dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur dang // bstan dang lhung bzed brims pa dang // ma dang gro bar bya ba dang // ston pa dang ni nags nyul dang /
368b4('dul ba): phyug mi bye dang med sbyi dang // la kha rU ba drA b+ha'i phyir rang ni// rnyed pa gcig tu byu phyir dang // bsgrub pa sbyin dang nyir gnas dang // khri dang nye dro'i phyir gri ga/ gsal dang gnyis gyi las yin// basbyin par rdzogs par bye ba dang // oM sdigs pa/
368b5('dul ba): dong mtshoms dgrol dang // mthun sbyin gso sbyong bdun po dag/ brgyad dang dran dang ma skyes dang // de nyid tshal du gzhug pa dang // bskye bar bye bo rnams dang ni// nyams pa sbyin par bya ba dang // gsol ba deng bzhi'i las yin// les brgya
368b6('dul ba): gcig pa/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod por smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po bram ze'i btsun pa slob dpon yon tan 'od bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pa// bde bar gshegs pa'i chos 'du
369a1('dul ba): ba bdud rtsi'i nying khrus shes rab kyi dbang po rgyas pa/ byung bar gshegs pa'i bka' dam pa nan tan snying por bsgrubs pas/ sde pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i sde snod mtha' dag gi gtso bor gyur pa/ 'phags
369a2('dul ba): pa bzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba kun las btus pa rdzogs so// / dbang phyug dam pa'i mdza' bdag dpal lha bcan po'i bka' lung gis 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par
369a3('dul ba): smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin gzi che'i bye brag tu spro ba'i slob dpon 'dzin mrit+ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
369a4('dul ba): 'di la shrI ka sum stong bdun brgya yod// bam po ni dgur byas so// mang+ga laM//
369a5('dul ba): mdzonam mi stongs rgyas kyi mo mtshon mar gyur 'gro ba yis// tsho bras du mar bsags pa'i sdig sgrib ma lus kun// dge 'angs drug lnga'i me lce chu yis bcil ba bzhin// ring min byang chub snying po'i go 'phang myur thob shog/ ces mi dang po lha ba
369a6('dul ba): sgo gsum tshig dril gyi smon lam btab pa'o// / bkra shis
